message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm ready to pay $10,000 for the product. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10,000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, at $14,000. This is my final offer to you.
